Sakura throws a barrage of [[kunai]] attached with bags of small [[explosive tag]]s and [[Wikipedia:Sakura|cherry blossom]] petals to help camouflage the tags. Sakura simply has to throw an additional kunai with an explosive tag to ignite the tags and catch the target in a large explosion.

[[es:Jutsu: Ventisca de Sakura]]
[[pl:Sakura Fubuki no Jutsu]]
[[pt-br:Técnica da Nevasca da Flor de Cerejeira]]
